text: Jwalakwe ampele jenumanja chilandanyo kuumila mu jenumanja mwachimisyene: Ana jenumanja nkwete wakamusyangana nao mwa (achikapolo) wagapatile magasa genu gakun’dyo pa (ipanje) yatumpele, mwanti jenumanja payalakweyo nkulandana (kagawane), ni kwajogopaga (achikapolowo) yankuti pakogopana mwachimisyene (alukosyo? Nambi uli nkum’bichila Allah akukamusyangana nao mwa achikapolo Wakwe)? Iyyoyopeyo ni yatukuti pagopolanya ma Aya kwa wandu wakwete lunda
